## Analysis


```{r}

all_parcels_int <- all_parcels%>%
  mutate(psep2030 = st_intersect(psep_2030),
         psep2050 = st_intersect(psep_2050),
         psep2070 = st_intersect(psep_2070))


units_in_mcfrm30<- all_parcels_int%>%
  filter(psep2030 = TRUE)%>%
  group_by(CITY, USE_CODE_SYMB)%>%
  summarize(units_2030 = sum(imputed_units),
            value_risk = )

units_in_mcfrm50<- st_intersect(all_parcels, psep_2050)%>%
  group_by(CITY)%>%
  summarize(units_2050 = sum(imputed_units))


units_in_mcfrm70 <-st_intersect(all_parcels, psep_2070)%>%
  group_by(CITY)%>%
  summarize(units_2050 = sum(imputed_units))


output_table<- full_join(units_in_mcfrm30, units_in_mcfrm50, by = "CITY")




```
